name: Raytheon Technologies Corporation
description: Raytheon Technologies Corporation is a multinational aerospace and defense conglomerate that specializes in advanced technologies in various domains, including aerospace, defense, and intelligence. Formed in April 2020 through the merger of Raytheon Company and United Technologies Corporation, Raytheon Technologies is headquartered in Waltham, Massachusetts. The company operates through four main business segments: Collins Aerospace, Pratt & Whitney, Raytheon Intelligence & Space, and Raytheon Missiles & Defense. Collins Aerospace provides critical aerospace components and systems, while Pratt & Whitney is known for its aircraft engines and propulsion systems. Raytheon Intelligence & Space focuses on advanced sensors and software, and Raytheon Missiles & Defense develops missile systems and air defense technologies. With a strong commitment to innovation, Raytheon Technologies invests heavily in research and development, aiming to deliver cutting-edge solutions for its customers, including government agencies and commercial enterprises. The company plays a vital role in enhancing global security and advancing aerospace capabilities, with a mission to be the most trusted partner in the aerospace and defense sector.
